description: Surrogate primary key identifying this migration mapping record.
Identifier of the migration batch or mapping set this record belongs to, used to group related column mappings.
Name of the source (legacy) column to be migrated.
Destination column name or transformation expression used to populate the target field during migration.
Special mapping directive (e.g., primary key flag, foreign key lookup, or NOW timestamp) that controls how the value is derived or validated.
Default value to apply when the source value is missing, null, or otherwise unmapped during migration.
Identifier of the user who created this mapping record.
Date/time when this mapping record was created.
Identifier of the user who last updated this mapping record.
Date/time of the most recent update to this mapping record.
